N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.15 - Other considerations

State Regulations
(a) Intrastate tributaries. In addition to the requirements of this Article, effluent quality requirements on intrastate tributaries shall include such
regulations as the state in which the tributary is located may impose in order
to comply with the water quality criteria provided by section
861.6
of this Part. (b) Operations. (1)
(i) Waste treatment operations, except disinfection, shall not be curtailed at any
time of the year. (ii)

The
capability to resume disinfection, upon reasonable notice not to exceed 15
days, shall be maintained. Notes
